high: Failure to do so will make Subcontractor liable for all costs related to the repair or replacement.
Failure to comply is an event of default under this Agreement.
Subcontractor shall pay for re-inspection at his sole expense.

Subcontractor shall employ all dirt and dust control measures required to meet all applicable codes, regulations, and governmental requirements, as amended or updated.
